content: english us terms also available in dutch i designed this square to be used as a 12 inch square using two colours you may of course use as many colours as you wish if using a lighter weight yarn the square will be smaller double knit comes out at approx 10 inches with a 4mm hook the pattern also has three options for the final round photos and optional details are included on the last page of the pdf use this square in any way you like for your own use but please do not reproduce or distribute this pattern without my consent i am delighted that esther from itsallinanutshell has made a video tutorial for spiro star 1 i would just like to make a note here that in round 10 you will be making front post triple trebles that s yarn over 4 times before you start using a normal fpdtr will pull the square out of shape 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=zi0wolypize
